<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The purpose of this class is to provide a common facility to traverse</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the function top-down or bottom-up via the dominator tree, and keep</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// track of the available registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonbitsimplify-cpp-/transformation"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonbitsimplify-cpp-/transformation/#a567b376259e3121b97947982911e59e7">Transformation</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint16&#95;t W) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint16&#95;t i = 0; i &lt; W; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If RC1&#91;i&#93; is &quot;bottom&quot;, it cannot be proven equal to RC2&#91;i&#93;.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All stores (except 64-bit stores) take a 32-bit register as the source</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the value to be stored. If the instruction stores into a location</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that is shorter than 32 bits, some bits of the source register are not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// used. For each store instruction, calculate the set of used bits in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the source register, and set appropriate bits in Bits. Return true if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the bits are calculated, false otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonbitsimplify-cpp-/hexagonbitsimplify/#a1e31c6660d607e046d5cff2b8305b5f2"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonbitsimplify-cpp-/hexagonbitsimplify/#a1e31c6660d607e046d5cff2b8305b5f2">HexagonBitSimplify::getUsedBitsInStore</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opc, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &amp;Bits,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For an instruction with opcode Opc, calculate the set of bits that it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// uses in a register in operand OpN. This only calculates the set of used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bits for cases where it does not depend on any operands (as is the case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in shifts, for example). For concrete instructions from a program, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operand may be a subregister of a larger register, while Bits would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// correspond to the larger register in its entirety. Because of that,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the parameter Begin can be used to indicate which bit of Bits should be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// considered the LSB of the operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonbitsimplify-cpp-/hexagonbitsimplify/#aa2295322a70c27651ecca9ccf7a27d9d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonbitsimplify-cpp-/hexagonbitsimplify/#aa2295322a70c27651ecca9ccf7a27d9d">HexagonBitSimplify::getUsedBits</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opc, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OpN,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &amp;Bits, uint16&#95;t Begin, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagoninstrinfo">HexagonInstrInfo</a> &amp;HII) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hexagon">Hexagon</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc">MCInstrDesc</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a> = HII.get(Opc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>.mayStore()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OpN == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>.getNumOperands()-1)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Eliminate redundant instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This transformation will identify instructions where the output register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is the same as one of its input registers. This only works on instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that define a single register (unlike post-increment loads, for example).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The equality check is actually more detailed: the code calculates which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bits of the output are used, and only compares these bits with the input</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the output matches an input, the instruction is replaced with COPY.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The copies will be removed by another transformation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonbitsimplify-cpp-/redundantinstrelimination"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonbitsimplify-cpp-/redundantinstrelimination/#aee884901a4bad6e0e83df32395854f3e">RedundantInstrElimination</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonbitsimplify-cpp-/transformation/#a567b376259e3121b97947982911e59e7">Transformation</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1263"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calculate the bits used by instruction MI in a register in operand OpN.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return true/false if the calculation succeeds/fails. If is succeeds, set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1266"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// used bits in Bits. This function does not reset any bits in Bits, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1267"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// subsequent calls over different instructions will result in the union</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1268"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the used bits in all these instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1269"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The register in question may be used with a sub-register, whereas Bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1270"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// holds the bits for the entire register. To keep track of that, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1271"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// argument Begin indicates where in Bits is the lowest-significant bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1272"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the register used in operand OpN. For example, in instruction:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1273"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %1 = S2&#95;lsr&#95;i&#95;r %2:isub&#95;hi, 10</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1274"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the operand 1 is a 32-bit register, which happens to be a subregister</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1275"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the 64-bit register %2, and that subregister starts at position 32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1276"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this case Begin=32, since Bits&#91;32&#93; would be the lowest-significant bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1277"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of %2:isub&#95;hi.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1278"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RedundantInstrElimination::computeUsedBits(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1379"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass can create copies between registers that don&#39;t have the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1380"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exact same values. Updating the tracker has to involve updating</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1381"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all dependent cells. Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1382"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %1  = inst %2     ; %1 != %2, but used bits are equal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1383"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %3  = copy %2     ; &lt;- inserted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1385"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ... = %3          ; &lt;- replaced from %2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1386"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Indirectly, we can create a &quot;copy&quot; between %1 and %2 even</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1387"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// though their exact values do not match.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1388"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BT.visit(&#42;CopyI);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1828"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the bits &#91;B..B+16) in register cell RC form a valid halfword,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1829"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// i.e. &#91;0..16), &#91;16..32), etc. of some register. If so, return true and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1830"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// set the information about the found register in RH.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1831"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BitSimplification::matchHalf(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SelfR,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1832"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bittracker/registercell">BitTracker::RegisterCell</a> &amp;RC, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, RegHalf &amp;RH) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1833"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// XXX This could be searching in the set of available registers, in case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1834"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the match is not exact.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1835"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1836"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Match 16-bit chunks, where the RC&#91;B..B+15&#93; references exactly one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1837"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register and all the bits B..B+15 match between RC and the register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1838"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is meant to match &quot;v1&#91;0-15&#93;&quot;, where v1 = &#123; &#91;0&#93;:0 &#91;1-15&#93;:v1... &#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1839"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and RC = &#123; &#91;0&#93;:0 &#91;1-15&#93;:v1&#91;1-15&#93;... &#125;.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;uses()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    if (!Op.isReg())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2178"><span class="doxyHighlight">      continue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BitTracker::RegisterRef RS = Op;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    if (!BT.has(RS.Reg))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2181"><span class="doxyHighlight">      continue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    const BitTracker::RegisterCell &amp;SC = BT.lookup(RS.Reg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    unsigned BN, BW;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    if (!HBS::getSubregMask(RS, BN, BW, MRI))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2185"><span class="doxyHighlight">      continue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    if (BW &lt; W || !HBS::isEqual(RC, 0, SC, BN, W))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2187"><span class="doxyHighlight">      continue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    if (!validateReg(RS, NewOpc, 1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2189"><span class="doxyHighlight">      continue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2190"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Register NewR = MRI.createVirtualRegister(&amp;Hexagon::IntRegsRegClass);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    auto At = MI-&gt;isPHI() ? B.getFirstNonPHI()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2193"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          : MachineBasicBlock::iterator(MI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2194"><span class="doxyHighlight">    auto MIB = BuildMI(B, At, DL, HII.get(NewOpc), NewR)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2195"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  .addReg(RS.Reg, 0, RS.Sub);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    if (NewOpc == Hexagon::A2&#95;andir)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2197"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MIB.addImm((1 &lt;&lt; W) - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    else if (NewOpc == Hexagon::S2&#95;extractu)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2199"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MIB.addImm(W).addImm(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    HBS::replaceSubWithSub(RD.Reg, RD.Sub, NewR, 0, MRI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2201"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BT.put(BitTracker::RegisterRef(NewR), RC);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    return true;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2354"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for tstbit simplification opportunity, where the bit being checked</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2356"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %2 = S2&#95;lsr&#95;i&#95;r  %1, 5</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2359"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %3 = S2&#95;tstbit&#95;i %1, 5</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2433"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/omp/#a16d7c5f77008a84ae20bf4a5c41e51f0ae88b4464fe326a51e6e6dfae28dd536d">Len</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2434"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxisellowering-cpp/#ae1a90b5d85643644483b2ca70da4d13faed3fa7a5efe80dad3ea3d86cc14be246">Signed</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2435"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2436"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The code is mostly class-independent, except for the part that generates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2437"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the extract instruction, and establishes the source register (in case it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2438"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// needs to use a subregister).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2439"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass">TargetRegisterClass</a> &#42;FRC = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonbitsimplify-cpp-/hexagonbitsimplify/#a8e3ebf47bfdde7c6ce8235ca71190e1b">HBS::getFinalVRegClass</a>(RD, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2440"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FRC != &amp;Hexagon::IntRegsRegClass &amp;&amp; FRC != &amp;Hexagon::DoubleRegsRegClass)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2441"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2442"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(RD.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bittracker/registerref/#afd26bd676aebea77891d6d204dd804d5">Sub</a> == 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2443"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2444"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Observation:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2445"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the cell has a form of 00..0xx..x with k zeros and n remaining</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2446"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bits, this could be an extractu of the n bits, but it could also be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2447"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an extractu of a longer field which happens to have 0s in the top</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2448"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bit positions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2449"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The same logic applies to sign-extended fields.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2450"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2451"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not check for the extended extracts, since it would expand the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2452"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// search space quite a bit. The search may be expensive as it is.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2453"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2454"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bittracker/bitvalue">BitTracker::BitValue</a> &amp;TopV = RC&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa05c79fbfc58d9dd2851c467a1ef166bf">W</a>-1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2455"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2456"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Eliminate candidates that have self-referential bits, since they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2457"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cannot be extracts from other registers. Also, skip registers that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2458"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have compile-time constant values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2459"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/arg/key/#aa25f7e1207f9595348bab62b54a3821d">IsConst</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2510"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2511"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The source can be longer than the destination, as long as its size is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2512"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a multiple of the size of the destination. Also, we would need to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2513"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// able to refer to the subregister in the source that would be of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2514"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same size as the destination, but only check the sizes here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2515"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SW &lt; RW || (SW % RW) != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2516"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2517"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2518"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The field can start at any offset in SC as long as it contains Len</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2519"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bits and does not cross subregister boundary (if the source register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2520"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is longer than the destination).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2521"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/isainfo/#ab6e8b39aa26af871d8ede5fa8c791ee6ad15305d7a4e34e02489c74a5ef542f36">Off</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Off &lt;= SW-Len) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2523"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OE = (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/isainfo/#ab6e8b39aa26af871d8ede5fa8c791ee6ad15305d7a4e34e02489c74a5ef542f36">Off</a>+<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/omp/#a16d7c5f77008a84ae20bf4a5c41e51f0ae88b4464fe326a51e6e6dfae28dd536d">Len</a>)/RW;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2524"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OE != Off/RW) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2525"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The assumption here is that if the source (R) is longer than the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2526"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// destination, then the destination is a sequence of words of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2527"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// size RW, and each such word in R can be accessed via a subregister.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2528"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2529"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the beginning and the end of the field cross the subregister</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2530"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// boundary, advance to the next subregister.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2531"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/isainfo/#ab6e8b39aa26af871d8ede5fa8c791ee6ad15305d7a4e34e02489c74a5ef542f36">Off</a> = OE&#42;RW;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2532"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2533"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2534"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonbitsimplify-cpp-/hexagonbitsimplify/#adbd71c7e83a21a2a3e90ba08d339dfcb">HBS::isEqual</a>(RC, 0, SC, Off, Len))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2535"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2536"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/isainfo/#ab6e8b39aa26af871d8ede5fa8c791ee6ad15305d7a4e34e02489c74a5ef542f36">Off</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2537"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2538"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2539"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Off &gt; SW-Len)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2540"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2541"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2542"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Found match.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2543"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ExtOpc = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2544"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Off == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2545"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Len == 8)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2546"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ExtOpc = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxisellowering-cpp/#ae1a90b5d85643644483b2ca70da4d13faed3fa7a5efe80dad3ea3d86cc14be246">Signed</a> ? <Link id="l02547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2547"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Len == 16)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2549"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Len &lt; 10 &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxisellowering-cpp/#ae1a90b5d85643644483b2ca70da4d13faed3fa7a5efe80dad3ea3d86cc14be246">Signed</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2551"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2552"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ExtOpc == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2554"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxisellowering-cpp/#ae1a90b5d85643644483b2ca70da4d13faed3fa7a5efe80dad3ea3d86cc14be246">Signed</a> ? <Link id="l02556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2556"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2557"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SR = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2558"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This only recognizes isub&#95;lo and isub&#95;hi.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2559"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RW != SW &amp;&amp; RW&#42;2 != SW)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2563"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/isainfo/#ab6e8b39aa26af871d8ede5fa8c791ee6ad15305d7a4e34e02489c74a5ef542f36">Off</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/isainfo/#ab6e8b39aa26af871d8ede5fa8c791ee6ad15305d7a4e34e02489c74a5ef542f36">Off</a> % RW;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2564"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2565"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!validateReg(&#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>,SR&#125;, ExtOpc, 1))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2611"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2612"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BitSimplification::simplifyRCmp0(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2687"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the source register is known to be 0 or non-0, the comparison can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2688"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be folded to a load of a constant.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2689"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (KnownZ || KnownNZ) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2690"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(KnownZ != KnownNZ &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Register cannot be both 0 and non-0&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2691"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ReplaceWithConst(KnownZ == (Opc == Hexagon::A4&#95;rcmpeqi));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2692"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2694"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Special case: if the compare comes from a C2&#95;muxii, then we know the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2846"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> : MF)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2847"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2849"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonbitsimplify-cpp-/deadcodeelimination/#a472c29a5101aac3859bf08dde7ab5c1a">DeadCodeElimination</a>(MF, &#42;MDT).run();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2850"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2851"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2852"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2853"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2854"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Recognize loops where the code at the end of the loop matches the code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2855"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// before the entry of the loop, and the matching code is such that is can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2856"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be simplified. This pass relies on the bit simplification above and only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2857"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// prepares code in a way that can be handled by the bit simplifcation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2858"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2859"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is the motivating testcase (and explanation):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2860"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2861"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2862"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   loop0(.LBB0&#95;2, r1)      // %for.body.preheader</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2863"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r5:4 = memd(r0++#8)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2864"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2865"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2866"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r3 = lsr(r4, #16)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2867"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r7:6 = combine(r5, r5)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2868"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2869"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2870"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r3 = insert(r5, #16, #16)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2871"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r7:6 = vlsrw(r7:6, #16)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2872"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2873"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// .LBB0&#95;2:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2874"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2875"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memh(r2+#4) = r5</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2876"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memh(r2+#6) = r6            # R6 is really R5.H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2877"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2878"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2879"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r2 = add(r2, #8)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2880"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memh(r2+#0) = r4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2881"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memh(r2+#2) = r3            # R3 is really R4.H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2882"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2883"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2884"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r5:4 = memd(r0++#8)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2885"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2886"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;                             # &quot;Shuffling&quot; code that sets up R3 and R6</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2887"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r3 = lsr(r4, #16)           # so that their halves can be stored in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2888"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r7:6 = combine(r5, r5)      # next iteration. This could be folded into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2889"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;                             # the stores if the code was at the beginning</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2890"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;                             # of the loop iteration. Since the same code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2891"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r3 = insert(r5, #16, #16)   # precedes the loop, it can actually be moved</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2892"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r7:6 = vlsrw(r7:6, #16)     # there.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2893"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;:endloop0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2894"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2895"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2896"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The outcome:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2897"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2898"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2899"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   loop0(.LBB0&#95;2, r1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2900"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r5:4 = memd(r0++#8)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2901"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2902"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// .LBB0&#95;2:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2903"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2904"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memh(r2+#4) = r5</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2905"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memh(r2+#6) = r5.h</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2906"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2907"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2908"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r2 = add(r2, #8)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2909"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memh(r2+#0) = r4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2910"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memh(r2+#2) = r4.h</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2911"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2912"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2913"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r5:4 = memd(r0++#8)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2914"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;:endloop0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2915"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2916"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2917"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2918"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionpass">FunctionPass</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9c9c8baa8635026abdfd9f56334dccba">createHexagonLoopRescheduling</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2919" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ef3e1aa2f426f444f420ae607cb8986"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ef3e1aa2f426f444f420ae607cb8986">initializeHexagonLoopReschedulingPass</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passregistry">PassRegistry</a>&amp;);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which is some value produced in the loop body. After moving the group</span></CodeLine>
